thread.title: Behind the scenes at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, one of the world's busiest airports [Photos]
thread.title_full: Behind the scenes at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, one of the world's busiest airports [Photos]

title: Behind the scenes at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, one of the world's busiest airports [Photos]
text:
Scott Mayerowitz, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First posted: Friday, September 04, 2015 12:00 PM MDT Behind the scenes at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport Previous Next 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, Addison Williams vacuums an aisle after arriving passengers deplaned a jet at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, ground crew chief Joseph Gordon, right, makes sure that passengers' bags are loaded onto a jet plane at the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, baggage handler Marco Diaz holds onto a giant stuffed animal that was checked as baggage for a flight to Brazil at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, a passenger wearing a sombrero checks with a flight gate agent at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, Scott Mills finishes fueling up an American Airlines jet at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Aug. 25, 2015 photo made with a timed exposure, an arriving passenger jet creates a streak of light as it lands on runway #2 at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, an American Airlines jet is towed into a gate at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this photo made early Thursday Aug. 26, 2015, the sun rises as a jetliner comes in for a landing at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday Aug. 26, 2015 photo, the ground operations tower monitors the early morning gate activity at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, air travelers wait in the Admiral's Club at the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo taken with a long exposure, escalators carry passengers in a terminal at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday Aug. 26, 2015 photo, the ground operations tower monitors the early morning gate activity at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, a passenger checks in at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Aug. 25, 2015 photo, a passenger jet lands at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Aug. 25, 2015 photo, a passenger jet taxis past a terminal after arriving at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, a Department of Homeland Security bomb sniffing dog walks on the tarmac while checking baggage at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, passengers line up to board a flight at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP 
In this Thursday, Aug. 26, 2015 photo, bartender Randy White begins to prepare drinks at the Admiral's Club at the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport in Grapevine, Texas. Each day, more than 170,000 passengers use the airport, making it the ninth busiest in the world. (AP Photo/LM Otero) AP
